house_listing.house_description: This condominium built in 1972 has 3 bedroom(s), 3 full bath(s)/1 half bath(s) and approximately 2957 square feet of living area. Features include private pool, air conditioning.
house_listing.firm_name: Wimbish-Riteway Re Lic. Real Estate Broker
